result.title: Форд-Беллман
result.content:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

struct edge{
	int from, to, len;
	edge(int _from, int _to, int _len): from(_from), to(_to), len(_len) {}
};

vector<edge> g;

int n, m;
int d[2345] = {};
const int INF = 1000000000;

int main()
{
	cin >> n >> m;
	for(int i = 0; i < m; i++){
		int from, to, len;
		cin >> from >> to >> len;
		g.push_back( edge(from, to, len) );
	}
	
	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) d[i] = INF;

	for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){
		for(int j = 0; j < m; j++){
			int from = g[j].from;
			int to = g[j].to;
			int len = g[j].len;
			if(d[from] < INF){
				if(d[to] > d[from] + len){
					d[to] = d[from] + len;
				}
			}
		}
	}	
	return 0;
}
